('NEWLINE', '\n')
('LBRACE', '{')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\tsteel_tons_needed = 10000;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\tcurrent_steel_count = 0;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\twhile(1)')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t{')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\tcurrent_steel_count += level.merchant_ship_death_count * 2000;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\tcurrent_steel_count += level.zero_death_count * 250;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\tcurrent_steel_count += level.ptboat_death_count * 500;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\tif(current_steel_count >= steel_tons_needed)')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t{')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t\tbreak;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t}')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\telse')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t{')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t\tcurrent_steel_count = 0;')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t}')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\t')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t\twait(0.5);')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('COMMENT', '\t}')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('IDENTIFIER', 'while')
('LPAREN', '(')
('IDENTIFIER', '1')
('RPAREN', ')')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('LBRACE', '{')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('IDENTIFIER', 'if')
('LPAREN', '(')

('IDENTIFIER', '45')
('RPAREN', ')')
('NEWLINE', '\n')
('LBRACE', '{')
